questions.question_text:
A project manager discovered that a component on the critical path is in danger of delay due to continuous disagreements between two developers. This personality-related issue can’t be resolved by the team.

What should the project manager do?

choices.C: Log the issue in the register and escalate to the human resources (HR) manager.
choices.D: Log the issue in the register and let the developers resolve the conflict.
choices.A: Log the issue in the register and delay the development of the component.
choices.B: Log the issue in the register and ask the team to make a decision by voting.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
C. Log the issue in the register and escalate to the human resources (HR) manager

Selected Answer: C
the pm must escalate to HR when the conflit is in the Total War phase.

Selected Answer: C
Asking the team to take a vote can have a knock-on effect on the behavior of the two developers against the team in which they are part of. Besides the question stated the “issue can’t be resolved by the team” so that’s ruled out B. 

Delaying the development of the component is not a good option, so A is wrong.

D would have been a good answer, but since it’s a continuous disagreement between the two developers even with possible intervention with the Project Manager to resolve their conflict. Hence, the last course of action to answer this question is to escalate the issue with the HR Manager, so answer is C.

questions.question_text:
A construction company recently won the bid for a project to build a cable bridge. A project charter has been prepared and a project manager has been assigned. The project manager is creating a work breakdown structure (WBS) for the project.

To what level should the project manager decompose their project?

choices.A: To the lowest level where cost and duration can be estimated and managed
choices.D: To the level where the bridge can be constructed safely
choices.B: To the level where the highest level of quality is maintained
choices.C: To level four of the schedule for bridge construction

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
A. To the lowest level where cost and duration can be estimated and managed

ChatGPT sais: 
A. To the lowest level where cost and duration can be estimated and managed

The purpose of creating a Work Breakdown Structure (WBS) is to decompose the project scope into smaller, more manageable components. These components are then used for estimating costs, defining schedules, assigning resources, and managing the project.

The project manager should decompose the project to the lowest level where cost and duration can be estimated and managed effectively. This ensures that the project is broken down into a sufficient level of detail to accurately estimate the resources and time required for each component of the project. It also enables effective cost and schedule management throughout the project lifecycle.

Selected Answer: A
It involves breaking down the project scope into manageable and measurable components, typically work packages or tasks, that can be assigned durations, resources, and costs.
